```python
def inject_command(self):
    """æ‰§è¡Œå‘½ä»¤æ³¨å…¥ - æ”¹è¿›ç‰ˆ"""
    # åŸºç¡€æ ¡éªŒ

        QMessageBox.warning(self, "é”™è¯¯", "è¯·å…ˆæ ¡å‡†ç›®æ ‡çª—å£")
        return
        
    if not self.log_file:
        QMessageBox.warning(self, "é”™è¯¯", "è¯·å…ˆé€‰æ‹©æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶")
        return

    if not command:

        return

def validate_target_window(self):
    """éªŒè¯ç›®æ ‡çª—å£æ˜¯å¦ä»ç„¶æœ‰æ•ˆ"""
    try:
        if not self.target_window:
            return False
        
        # æ£€æŸ¥çª—å£æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨
        if not win32gui.IsWindow(self.target_window):
            return False
        
        # æ£€æŸ¥çª—å£æ˜¯å¦å¯è§
        if not win32gui.IsWindowVisible(self.target_window):
            return False
        
        # å°è¯•è·å–çª—å£æ ‡é¢˜ï¼ˆæµ‹è¯•çª—å£æ˜¯å¦å“åº”ï¼‰
        try:
            title = win32gui.GetWindowText(self.target_window)
            return True
        except:
            return False
            
    except Exception as e:
        print(f"éªŒè¯ç›®æ ‡çª—å£å¤±è´¥: {str(e)}")
        return False

def safe_activate_window(self):
    """å®‰å…¨åœ°æ¿€æ´»ç›®æ ‡çª—å£"""
    try:
        # æ–¹æ³•1ï¼šå°è¯•ç›´æ¥æ¿€æ´»

            time.sleep(0.2)
            
            # éªŒè¯æ˜¯å¦æˆåŠŸæ¿€æ´»

                return True
        except Exception as e:
            print(f"ç›´æ¥æ¿€æ´»å¤±è´¥: {str(e)}")

            current_window = win32gui.GetForegroundWindow()
            if current_window == self.target_window:
                return True
        except Exception as e:
            print(f"ShowWindowæ¿€æ´»å¤±è´¥: {str(e)}")

            win32api.keybd_event(win32con.VK_TAB, 0, 0, 0)   # Tab down

            win32api.keybd_event(win32con.VK_TAB, 0, win32con.KEYEVENTF_KEYUP, 0)   # Tab up
            win32api.keybd_event(win32con.VK_MENU, 0, win32con.KEYEVENTF_KEYUP, 0)  # Alt up
            time.sleep(0.3)
            
            # ç„¶åå°è¯•æ¿€æ´»

            time.sleep(0.2)
            
            return True

        return False
        
    except Exception as e:

def perform_injection_steps(self, command):
    """æ‰§è¡Œæ³¨å…¥æ­¥éª¤"""
    try:
        # ç§»åŠ¨é¼ æ ‡åˆ°ç›®æ ‡ä½ç½®
        point = win32gui.ClientToScreen(self.target_window, self.target_position)
        win32api.SetCursorPos(point)
        time.sleep(0.1)
        
        # ç‚¹å‡»ç›®æ ‡ä½ç½®
        win32api.mouse_event(win32con.MOUSEEVENTF_LEFTDOWN, 0, 0, 0, 0)
        time.sleep(0.1)
        win32api.mouse_event(win32con.MOUSEEVENTF_LEFTUP, 0, 0, 0, 0)
        time.sleep(0.1)
        
        # ç¡®ä¿å‰ªè´´æ¿å†…å®¹æ­£ç¡®
        win32clipboard.OpenClipboard()
        win32clipboard.EmptyClipboard()
        win32clipboard.SetClipboardText(command)
        win32clipboard.CloseClipboard()
        time.sleep(0.1)
        
        # æ¨¡æ‹ŸCtrl+Vç²˜è´´
        win32api.keybd_event(win32con.VK_CONTROL, 0, 0, 0)
        win32api.keybd_event(ord('V'), 0, 0, 0)
        time.sleep(0.1)
        win32api.keybd_event(ord('V'), 0, win32con.KEYEVENTF_KEYUP, 0)
        win32api.keybd_event(win32con.VK_CONTROL, 0, win32con.KEYEVENTF_KEYUP, 0)
        time.sleep(0.1)
        
        # æ¨¡æ‹Ÿå›è½¦é”®
        win32api.keybd_event(win32con.VK_RETURN, 0, 0, 0)
        time.sleep(0.1)
        win32api.keybd_event(win32con.VK_RETURN, 0, win32con.KEYEVENTF_KEYUP, 0)
        
    except Exception as e:
        raise Exception(f"æ‰§è¡Œæ³¨å…¥æ­¥éª¤å¤±è´¥: {str(e)}")
```

### 2. å¢å¼ºçš„æ ¡å‡†é‡ç½®æ–¹æ³•

```python
def reset_calibration(self):
    """é‡ç½®æ ¡å‡†çŠ¶æ€ - å¢å¼ºç‰ˆ"""
    self.mouse_hook = False
    if self.calibration_timer:
        self.calibration_timer.stop()
    
    # æ¸…ç©ºç›®æ ‡çª—å£ä¿¡æ¯
    self.target_window = None
    self.target_position = None
    self.target_window_title = None
    
    # é‡ç½®UIçŠ¶æ€
    self.calibrate_button.setEnabled(True)
    self.calibrate_button.setText("å¼€å§‹æ ¡å‡†")
    self.calibrate_button.setStyleSheet("")  # æ¸…é™¤æˆåŠŸæ ·å¼
    
    # æ›´æ–°çŠ¶æ€æ˜¾ç¤º
    self.update_status_label()
    
    # æ¸…é™¤ä¿å­˜çš„é…ç½®
    try:
        if os.path.exists(CONFIG_PATH):
            with open(CONFIG_PATH, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f:
                config = json.load(f)
            
            # æ¸…é™¤çª—å£ç›¸å…³é…ç½®
            config.pop('target_window', None)
            config.pop('target_position', None)
            config.pop('target_window_title', None)
            
            with open(CONFIG_PATH, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f:
                json.dump(config, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False)
    except Exception as e:
        print(f"æ¸…é™¤é…ç½®å¤±è´¥: {str(e)}")
```

### 3. å¯åŠ¨æ—¶çš„é…ç½®éªŒè¯

```python
def load_config(self):
    """åŠ è½½é…ç½® - å¢å¼ºç‰ˆ"""
    try:
        if os.path.exists(CONFIG_PATH):
            with open(CONFIG_PATH, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f:
                config = json.load(f)
            
            # åŠ è½½çª—å£é…ç½®
            if 'target_window' in config:
                target_window = config['target_window']
                
                # éªŒè¯çª—å£æ˜¯å¦ä»ç„¶æœ‰æ•ˆ
                if self.is_valid_window(target_window):
                    self.target_window = target_window
                    self.target_position = tuple(config.get('target_position', [0, 0]))
                    self.target_window_title = config.get('target_window_title', '')
                    self.update_status_label()
                else:
                    # çª—å£æ— æ•ˆï¼Œæ¸…é™¤é…ç½®
                    print("å·²ä¿å­˜çš„ç›®æ ‡çª—å£æ— æ•ˆï¼Œå·²æ¸…é™¤é…ç½®")
                    self.reset_calibration()
            
            # åŠ è½½å…¶ä»–é…ç½®...
            
    except Exception as e:
        print(f"åŠ è½½é…ç½®å¤±è´¥: {str(e)}")

def is_valid_window(self, hwnd):
    """æ£€æŸ¥çª—å£å¥æŸ„æ˜¯å¦æœ‰æ•ˆ"""
    try:
        if not hwnd:
            return False
        return win32gui.IsWindow(hwnd) and win32gui.IsWindowVisible(hwnd)
    except:
        return False
```

```python
def start_calibration(self):
    """å¼€å§‹æ ¡å‡†æµç¨‹"""
    try:
        # æ˜¾ç¤ºæç¤ºä¿¡æ¯
        QMessageBox.information(self, "æç¤º", "è¯·ç‚¹å‡»ç›®æ ‡çª—å£çš„å‘½ä»¤è¾“å…¥æ¡†...")
        
        # è®¾ç½®é¼ æ ‡é’©å­
        self.mouse_hook = True
        self.calibrate_button.setEnabled(False)
        self.calibrate_button.setText("æ­£åœ¨æ ¡å‡†...")
        
        # éšè—çª—å£
        self.hide()
        
        # å¯åŠ¨å®šæ—¶å™¨æ£€æŸ¥é¼ æ ‡ç‚¹å‡»
        self.calibration_timer = QTimer()
        self.calibration_timer.timeout.connect(self.check_mouse_click)
        self.calibration_timer.start(100)  # æ¯100msæ£€æŸ¥ä¸€æ¬¡
```

**è·å–ä¿¡æ¯**ï¼š
- å¯åŠ¨é¼ æ ‡ç›‘å¬æœºåˆ¶
- è®¾ç½®100msé—´éš”çš„å®šæ—¶å™¨æ¥æŒç»­ç›‘æ§é¼ æ ‡çŠ¶æ€

### 2. é¼ æ ‡ç‚¹å‡»æ£€æµ‹é˜¶æ®µ

```python
def check_mouse_click(self):
    """æ£€æŸ¥é¼ æ ‡ç‚¹å‡»"""
    try:
        if not self.mouse_hook:
            self.calibration_timer.stop()
            return
            
        if win32api.GetAsyncKeyState(win32con.VK_LBUTTON) & 0x8000:
            # è·å–é¼ æ ‡ä½ç½®
            point = win32api.GetCursorPos()
            
            # è·å–ç‚¹å‡»çš„çª—å£å¥æŸ„
            hwnd = win32gui.WindowFromPoint(point)
```

**è·å–ä¿¡æ¯**ï¼š
- **é¼ æ ‡åæ ‡**ï¼š`win32api.GetCursorPos()` è·å–å±å¹•ç»å¯¹åæ ‡
- **çª—å£å¥æŸ„**ï¼š`win32gui.WindowFromPoint(point)` æ ¹æ®é¼ æ ‡ä½ç½®è·å–å¯¹åº”çš„çª—å£å¥æŸ„

```python
    # è·å–çª—å£æ ‡é¢˜
    title = win32gui.GetWindowText(hwnd)
    if title:
        # å°è¯•è·å–æ›´ç²¾ç¡®çš„åº”ç”¨åç§°
```

### 4. åº”ç”¨ç¨‹åºæ·±åº¦è¯†åˆ«é˜¶æ®µ

```python
def get_application_name(self, hwnd, window_title):
    """è·å–æ›´ç²¾ç¡®çš„åº”ç”¨ç¨‹åºåç§°"""
    try:
        # å°è¯•è·å–è¿›ç¨‹ID
        _, process_id = win32process.GetWindowThreadProcessId(hwnd)
        
        # å°è¯•è·å–è¿›ç¨‹åç§°
        try:
            handle = win32api.OpenProcess(win32con.PROCESS_QUERY_INFORMATION | win32con.PROCESS_VM_READ, False, process_id)
            exe_path = win32process.GetModuleFileNameEx(handle, 0)
            app_name = os.path.basename(exe_path)
            win32api.CloseHandle(handle)
```

**è·å–ä¿¡æ¯**ï¼š
- **è¿›ç¨‹ID**ï¼š`win32process.GetWindowThreadProcessId(hwnd)` è·å–çª—å£å¯¹åº”çš„è¿›ç¨‹ID
- **å¯æ‰§è¡Œæ–‡ä»¶è·¯å¾„**ï¼š`win32process.GetModuleFileNameEx()` è·å–è¿›ç¨‹çš„å®Œæ•´æ‰§è¡Œè·¯å¾„
- **è¿›ç¨‹åç§°**ï¼šä»è·¯å¾„ä¸­æå–æ–‡ä»¶å

#### æ–¹æ¡ˆ2ï¼šæ”¹è¿›injectionå·¥å…·çš„çª—å£æ¿€æ´»é€»è¾‘

```python
def safe_activate_window_enhanced(self):
    """å¢å¼ºçš„å®‰å…¨çª—å£æ¿€æ´»æ–¹æ³•"""
    try:
        # æ£€æŸ¥å»¶è¿Ÿå‚æ•°
        if hasattr(self, 'injection_delay') and self.injection_delay > 0:
            print(f"â° å»¶è¿Ÿ {self.injection_delay} ç§’åæ‰§è¡Œæ³¨å…¥...")
            time.sleep(self.injection_delay)
        
        # æ–¹æ³•1ï¼šå°è¯•ç›´æ¥æ¿€æ´»
        try:
            # æ£€æŸ¥ç›®æ ‡çª—å£æ˜¯å¦ä»ç„¶æœ‰æ•ˆ
            if not win32gui.IsWindow(self.target_window):
                raise Exception("ç›®æ ‡çª—å£å·²å¤±æ•ˆ")
            
            # é¦–å…ˆå°è¯•æ˜¾ç¤ºçª—å£
            win32gui.ShowWindow(self.target_window, win32con.SW_RESTORE)
            time.sleep(0.2)
            
            # ç„¶åæ¿€æ´»çª—å£
            win32gui.SetForegroundWindow(self.target_window)
            time.sleep(0.3)
            
            # éªŒè¯æ¿€æ´»æ˜¯å¦æˆåŠŸ
            current_window = win32gui.GetForegroundWindow()
            if current_window == self.target_window:
                print("âœ… çª—å£æ¿€æ´»æˆåŠŸ")
                return True
                
        except Exception as e:
            print(f"ç›´æ¥æ¿€æ´»å¤±è´¥: {str(e)}")
        
        # æ–¹æ³•2ï¼šé€šè¿‡é”®ç›˜å¿«æ·é”®æ¿€æ´»
        try:
            # å‘é€Alt+Tabå°è¯•åˆ‡æ¢åˆ°ç›®æ ‡çª—å£
            win32api.keybd_event(win32con.VK_MENU, 0, 0, 0)  # Alt down
            time.sleep(0.1)
            
            # å¤šæ¬¡Tabç›´åˆ°æ‰¾åˆ°ç›®æ ‡çª—å£
            for i in range(5):
                win32api.keybd_event(win32con.VK_TAB, 0, 0, 0)
                time.sleep(0.1)
                win32api.keybd_event(win32con.VK_TAB, 0, win32con.KEYEVENTF_KEYUP, 0)
                time.sleep(0.1)
                
                # æ£€æŸ¥å½“å‰çª—å£
                current_window = win32gui.GetForegroundWindow()
                if current_window == self.target_window:
                    win32api.keybd_event(win32con.VK_MENU, 0, win32con.KEYEVENTF_KEYUP, 0)  # Alt up
                    print("âœ… é€šè¿‡Alt+Tabæ¿€æ´»æˆåŠŸ")
                    return True
            
            win32api.keybd_event(win32con.VK_MENU, 0, win32con.KEYEVENTF_KEYUP, 0)  # Alt up
            
        except Exception as e:
            print(f"Alt+Tabæ¿€æ´»å¤±è´¥: {str(e)}")
        
        # æ–¹æ³•3ï¼šå¼ºåˆ¶æ¿€æ´»ï¼ˆéœ€è¦ç®¡ç†å‘˜æƒé™ï¼‰
        try:
            # è·å–å½“å‰å‰å°çª—å£çš„çº¿ç¨‹ID
            current_window = win32gui.GetForegroundWindow()
            current_thread_id = win32process.GetWindowThreadProcessId(current_window)[0]
            
            # è·å–ç›®æ ‡çª—å£çš„çº¿ç¨‹ID
            target_thread_id = win32process.GetWindowThreadProcessId(self.target_window)[0]
            
            # é™„åŠ åˆ°å½“å‰å‰å°çª—å£çš„è¾“å…¥é˜Ÿåˆ—
            win32process.AttachThreadInput(current_thread_id, target_thread_id, True)
            
            # æ¿€æ´»ç›®æ ‡çª—å£
            win32gui.SetForegroundWindow(self.target_window)
            win32gui.SetFocus(self.target_window)
            
            # åˆ†ç¦»è¾“å…¥é˜Ÿåˆ—
            win32process.AttachThreadInput(current_thread_id, target_thread_id, False)
            
            time.sleep(0.2)
            
            # éªŒè¯æ¿€æ´»
            current_window = win32gui.GetForegroundWindow()
            if current_window == self.target_window:
                print("âœ… å¼ºåˆ¶æ¿€æ´»æˆåŠŸ")
                return True
                
        except Exception as e:
            print(f"å¼ºåˆ¶æ¿€æ´»å¤±è´¥: {str(e)}")
        
        return False
        
    except Exception as e:
        print(f"å®‰å…¨æ¿€æ´»çª—å£å¤±è´¥: {str(e)}")
        return False

def inject_command_enhanced(self):
    """å¢å¼ºçš„å‘½ä»¤æ³¨å…¥æ–¹æ³•"""
    # è§£æå‰ªè´´æ¿ä¸­çš„å»¶è¿Ÿå‚æ•°

    except:
        self.injection_delay = 0
    
    # åŸºç¡€æ ¡éªŒ
    if not self.target_window or not self.target_position:

        self.reset_calibration()

            return
        
        # ç»§ç»­æ‰§è¡Œæ³¨å…¥...
        # ... ç°æœ‰çš„æ³¨å…¥é€»è¾‘ ...
        
    except Exception as e:
        QMessageBox.critical(self, "é”™è¯¯", f"æ³¨å…¥å‘½ä»¤å¤±è´¥: {str(e)}")
```

#### æ–¹æ¡ˆ3ï¼šç”¨æˆ·äº¤äº’ç¡®è®¤æœºåˆ¶

```bash
å›¢é˜Ÿéœ€è¦è®¨è®ºè¿™ä¸ªåŠŸèƒ½çš„å®ç°æ–¹æ¡ˆã€‚
è®¡åˆ’ä¸‹å‘¨å¼€ä¼šï¼Œé‚€è¯·äº§å“ç»ç†å‚ä¸ã€‚\`;

            document.getElementById('mdInput').value = mixedMD;
            showMessage('âœ… å·²åŠ è½½æ··åˆæ ¼å¼æ ·æœ¬', 'success');
        }
        
        // ğŸ”® æµ‹è¯•SmartMDParser
        function testSmartParser() {
            const mdContent = document.getElementById('mdInput').value;
            if (!mdContent.trim()) {
                showMessage('âŒ è¯·å…ˆè¾“å…¥MDæ–‡æ¡£å†…å®¹', 'error');
                return;
            }
            
            if (!smartParser) {
                showMessage('âŒ SmartMDParser æœªåˆå§‹åŒ–', 'error');
                return;
            }
            
            try {
                console.log('ğŸ”® å¼€å§‹SmartMDParseræµ‹è¯•...');
                
                // åˆ†æ®µè§£æï¼ˆæŒ‰æ ‡é¢˜åˆ†å‰²ï¼‰
                const sections = splitMDIntoSections(mdContent);
                const results = [];
                
                sections.forEach((section, index) => {
                    if (section.title && section.content) {
                        const parsed = smartParser.parse(section.content);
                        results.push({
                            index: index + 1,
                            originalTitle: section.title,
                            section: section,
                            parsed: parsed
                        });
                    }
                });
                
                displaySmartParserResults(results);
                
            } catch (error) {
                console.error('âŒ SmartMDParser æµ‹è¯•å¤±è´¥:', error);
                showMessage(\`âŒ SmartMDParser æµ‹è¯•å¤±è´¥: \${error.message}\`, 'error');
            }
        }
        
        // ğŸ“‹ æµ‹è¯•ç»“æ„åŒ–è§£æå™¨ï¼ˆæ¨¡æ‹Ÿä¸»ç¨‹åºçš„è§£æå™¨ï¼‰
        function testStructuredParser() {
            const mdContent = document.getElementById('mdInput').value;
            if (!mdContent.trim()) {
                showMessage('âŒ è¯·å…ˆè¾“å…¥MDæ–‡æ¡£å†…å®¹', 'error');
                return;
            }
            
            try {
                console.log('ğŸ“‹ å¼€å§‹ç»“æ„åŒ–è§£æå™¨æµ‹è¯•...');
                
                const nodes = parseStructuredMD(mdContent);
                displayStructuredResults(nodes);
                
            } catch (error) {
                console.error('âŒ ç»“æ„åŒ–è§£æå™¨æµ‹è¯•å¤±è´¥:', error);
                showMessage(\`âŒ ç»“æ„åŒ–è§£æå™¨æµ‹è¯•å¤±è´¥: \${error.message}\`, 'error');
            }
        }
        
        // ğŸ“Š æ˜¾ç¤ºæµ‹è¯•ç»“æœ
        function displaySmartParserResults(results) {
            const html = \`
                <div class="result success">
                    <h3>ğŸ”® SmartMDParser è§£æç»“æœ</h3>
                    <div class="stats">
                        <strong>è§£æèŠ‚ç‚¹æ•°:</strong> \${results.length}
                    </div>
                    \${results.map(result => \`
                        <div style="margin: 15px 0; padding: 10px; border: 1px solid #ddd; border-radius: 4px;">
                            <h4>èŠ‚ç‚¹ \${result.index}: \${result.originalTitle}</h4>
                            <div><strong>æ¨æ–­ç±»å‹:</strong> \${result.parsed.type}</div>
                            <div><strong>æå–æ ‡é¢˜:</strong> \${result.parsed.title}</div>
                            <div><strong>å…­è¦ç´ :</strong></div>
                            <ul>
                                \${Object.entries(result.parsed.sixElements || {}).map(([key, value]) => 
                                    \`<li><strong>\${key}:</strong> \${value}</li>\`
                                ).join('')}
                            </ul>
                        </div>
                    \`).join('')}
                </div>
            \`;
            
            document.getElementById('results').innerHTML = html;
        }
        
        function displayStructuredResults(nodes) {
            const html = \`
                <div class="result warning">
                    <h3>ğŸ“‹ ç»“æ„åŒ–è§£æå™¨ç»“æœ</h3>
                    <div class="stats">
                        <strong>è§£æèŠ‚ç‚¹æ•°:</strong> \${nodes.length}
                    </div>
                    \${nodes.map((node, index) => \`
                        <div style="margin: 15px 0; padding: 10px; border: 1px solid #ddd; border-radius: 4px;">
                            <h4>èŠ‚ç‚¹ \${index + 1}: \${node.title}</h4>
                            <div><strong>ID:</strong> \${node.id}</div>
                            <div><strong>å±‚çº§:</strong> \${node.level}</div>
                            <div><strong>ä½œè€…:</strong> \${node.author}</div>
                            <div><strong>ä¼˜å…ˆçº§:</strong> \${node.priority}</div>
                            <div><strong>çŠ¶æ€:</strong> \${node.status}</div>
                            <div><strong>æ ‡ç­¾:</strong> \${node.tags.join(', ') || 'æ— '}</div>
                            <div><strong>å†…å®¹:</strong> \${node.content.substring(0, 100)}\${node.content.length > 100 ? '...' : ''}</div>
                        </div>
                    \`).join('')}
                </div>
            \`;
            
            document.getElementById('results').innerHTML = html;
        }
        
        // ğŸ”„ å¯¹æ¯”ç»“æœ
        function compareResults() {
            const mdContent = document.getElementById('mdInput').value;
            if (!mdContent.trim()) {
                showMessage('âŒ è¯·å…ˆè¾“å…¥MDæ–‡æ¡£å†…å®¹', 'error');
                return;
            }
            
            try {
                // SmartMDParserç»“æœ
                const sections = splitMDIntoSections(mdContent);
                const smartResults = [];
                
                if (smartParser) {
                    sections.forEach((section, index) => {
                        if (section.title && section.content) {
                            const parsed = smartParser.parse(section.content);
                            smartResults.push(parsed);
                        }
                    });
                }
                
                // ç»“æ„åŒ–è§£æå™¨ç»“æœ
                const structuredResults = parseStructuredMD(mdContent);
                
                displayComparison(smartResults, structuredResults);
                
            } catch (error) {
                console.error('âŒ å¯¹æ¯”æµ‹è¯•å¤±è´¥:', error);
                showMessage(\`âŒ å¯¹æ¯”æµ‹è¯•å¤±è´¥: \${error.message}\`, 'error');
            }
        }
        
        function displayComparison(smartResults, structuredResults) {
            const html = \`
                <div class="result">
                    <h3>âš–ï¸ ä¸¤ç§è§£æå™¨å¯¹æ¯”</h3>
                    <div class="comparison">
                        <div>
                            <h4>ğŸ”® SmartMDParser</h4>
                            <div class="stats">èŠ‚ç‚¹æ•°: \${smartResults.length}</div>
                            <div class="format-example">
ç‰¹ç‚¹:
â€¢ éšæ€§å…­è¦ç´ æå–
â€¢ æ™ºèƒ½ç±»å‹æ¨æ–­
â€¢ è‡ªç„¶MDæ–‡æ¡£è§£æ
â€¢ ä¸ä¾èµ–æ˜¾æ€§å…ƒæ•°æ®

è§£æèƒ½åŠ›:
\${smartResults.map(r => \`â€¢ \${r.title} (\${r.type})\`).join('\\n')}
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div>
                            <h4>ğŸ“‹ ç»“æ„åŒ–è§£æå™¨</h4>
                            <div class="stats">èŠ‚ç‚¹æ•°: \${structuredResults.length}</div>
                            <div class="format-example">
ç‰¹ç‚¹:
â€¢ ä¾èµ–æ˜¾æ€§å…ƒæ•°æ®è¡¨æ ¼
â€¢ ç²¾ç¡®å­—æ®µè§£æ
â€¢ æ•°æ®åº“å¼ç»“æ„
â€¢ éœ€è¦å›ºå®šæ ¼å¼

è§£æèƒ½åŠ›:
\${structuredResults.map(r => \`â€¢ \${r.title} (\${r.priority})\`).join('\\n')}
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    
                    <h4>ğŸ“Š å¯¹æ¯”æ€»ç»“</h4>
                    <div class="stats">
                        <div><strong>SmartMDParserä¼˜åŠ¿:</strong> è§£æè‡ªç„¶MDæ–‡æ¡£ï¼Œç¬¦åˆMDæœ¬æ„ï¼Œéšæ€§æå–ä¿¡æ¯</div>
                        <div><strong>ç»“æ„åŒ–è§£æå™¨ä¼˜åŠ¿:</strong> ç²¾ç¡®è§£ææ˜¾æ€§å…ƒæ•°æ®ï¼Œæ•°æ®å®Œæ•´æ€§é«˜</div>
                        <div><strong>å»ºè®®:</strong> æ··åˆä½¿ç”¨ï¼Œä¼˜å…ˆSmartMDParserï¼Œé™çº§åˆ°ç»“æ„åŒ–è§£æå™¨</div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            \`;
            
            document.getElementById('results').innerHTML = html;
        }
        
        // ğŸ§¹ æ¸…ç©ºç»“æœ
        function clearResults() {
            document.getElementById('results').innerHTML = '';
            showMessage('âœ… ç»“æœå·²æ¸…ç©º', 'success');
        }
        
        // è¾…åŠ©å‡½æ•°ï¼šåˆ†å‰²MDæ–‡æ¡£ä¸ºèŠ‚ç‚¹æ®µè½
        function splitMDIntoSections(mdContent) {
            const lines = mdContent.split('\\n');
            const sections = [];
            let currentSection = null;
            
            for (let i = 0; i < lines.length; i++) {
                const line = lines[i].trim();
                
                // æ£€æµ‹æ ‡é¢˜
                const titleMatch = line.match(/^(#{1,6})\\s+(.+)$/);
                if (titleMatch) {
                    // ä¿å­˜ä¸Šä¸€ä¸ªsection
                    if (currentSection) {
                        sections.push(currentSection);
                    }
                    
                    // å¼€å§‹æ–°section
                    currentSection = {
                        level: titleMatch[1].length,
                        title: titleMatch[2].trim(),
                        content: line + '\\n',
                        lines: [line]
                    };
                } else if (currentSection) {
                    // æ·»åŠ åˆ°å½“å‰section
                    currentSection.content += line + '\\n';
                    currentSection.lines.push(line);
                }
            }
            
            // ä¿å­˜æœ€åä¸€ä¸ªsection
            if (currentSection) {
                sections.push(currentSection);
            }
            
            return sections;
        }
        
        // ç»“æ„åŒ–MDè§£æå™¨ï¼ˆç®€åŒ–ç‰ˆï¼Œæ¨¡æ‹Ÿä¸»ç¨‹åºé€»è¾‘ï¼‰
        function parseStructuredMD(mdContent) {
            const nodes = [];
            const lines = mdContent.split('\\n');
            
            let currentNode = null;
            let currentContent = [];
            
            for (let i = 0; i < lines.length; i++) {
                const line = lines[i].trim();
                if (!line) continue;
                
                // æ£€æµ‹æ ‡é¢˜
                const titleMatch = line.match(/^(#{2,6})\\s+(.+)$/);
                if (titleMatch) {
                    // ä¿å­˜ä¸Šä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹
                    if (currentNode) {
                        currentNode.content = currentContent.join('\\n').trim();
                        nodes.push(currentNode);
                    }
                    
                    // å¼€å§‹æ–°èŠ‚ç‚¹
                    const level = titleMatch[1].length;
                    const title = titleMatch[2].trim();
                    
                    currentNode = {
                        id: generateId(title),
                        title: title,
                        level: level,
                        content: '',
                        tags: [],
                        author: 'ç”¨æˆ·',
                        priority: 'medium',
                        status: 'pending',
                        metadata: {}
                    };
                    
                    currentContent = [];
                    continue;
                }
                
                // å¦‚æœå½“å‰æœ‰èŠ‚ç‚¹åœ¨å¤„ç†
                if (currentNode) {
                    // è§£æèŠ‚ç‚¹ID
                    const idMatch = line.match(/èŠ‚ç‚¹ID.*\`([^\`]+)\`/);
                    if (idMatch) {
                        currentNode.id = idMatch[1].trim();
                        continue;
                    }
                    
                    // è§£æä½œè€…
                    const authorMatch = line.match(/ä½œè€….*\\|\\s*([^|]+)\\s*\\|/);
                    if (authorMatch) {
                        currentNode.author = authorMatch[1].trim();
                        continue;
                    }
                    
                    // è§£æä¼˜å…ˆçº§
                    const priorityMatch = line.match(/ä¼˜å…ˆçº§.*\\|\\s*([^|]+)\\s*\\|/);
                    if (priorityMatch) {
                        currentNode.priority = priorityMatch[1].trim();
                        continue;
                    }
                    
                    // è§£æçŠ¶æ€
                    const statusMatch = line.match(/çŠ¶æ€.*\\|\\s*([^|]+)\\s*\\|/);
                    if (statusMatch) {
                        currentNode.status = statusMatch[1].trim();
                        continue;
                    }
                    
                    // è§£ææ ‡ç­¾
                    const tagsMatch = line.match(/æ ‡ç­¾.*\\|\\s*([^|]+)\\s*\\|/);
                    if (tagsMatch) {
                        const tagString = tagsMatch[1].trim();
                        if (tagString !== 'æ— ' && tagString !== '') {
                            currentNode.tags = tagString.split(/[#\\s]+/)
                                .map(tag => tag.trim())
                                .filter(tag => tag);
                        }
                        continue;
                    }
                    
                    // è·³è¿‡è¡¨æ ¼åˆ†éš”çº¿å’Œå…¶ä»–å…ƒæ•°æ®è¡Œ
                    if (line.match(/^\\|/) || line.match(/^-+$/) || line.match(/^\\*\\*[^*]+\\*\\*:/)) {
                        continue;
                    }
                    
                    // æ”¶é›†å†…å®¹ï¼ˆè·³è¿‡ä»£ç å—æ ‡è®°ï¼‰
                    if (line !== '\`\`\`' && line.trim()) {
                        // ç®€å•çš„æ ‡ç­¾æå–ï¼ˆä»å†…å®¹ä¸­ï¼‰
                        const contentTags = line.match(/#\\w+/g);
                        if (contentTags) {
                            contentTags.forEach(tag => {
                                const cleanTag = tag.substring(1);
                                if (!currentNode.tags.includes(cleanTag)) {
                                    currentNode.tags.push(cleanTag);
                                }
                            });
                        }
                        
                        currentContent.push(line);
                    }
                }
            }
            
            // ä¿å­˜æœ€åä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹
            if (currentNode) {
                currentNode.content = currentContent.join('\\n').trim();
                nodes.push(currentNode);
            }
            
            return nodes;
        }
        
        // ç”Ÿæˆç®€å•ID
        function generateId(title) {
            const timestamp = Date.now();
            const random = Math.random().toString(36).substr(2, 6);
            const titleHash = title.slice(0, 10).replace(/[^a-zA-Z0-9]/g, '');
            return \`node_\${titleHash}_\${timestamp}_\${random}\`;
        }
        
        // æ˜¾ç¤ºæ¶ˆæ¯
        function showMessage(message, type = 'success') {
            const existingMsg = document.querySelector('.temp-message');
            if (existingMsg) existingMsg.remove();
            
            const msgDiv = document.createElement('div');
            msgDiv.className = \`temp-message \${type}\`;
            msgDiv.style.cssText = \`
                position: fixed;
                top: 20px;
                right: 20px;
                padding: 10px 20px;
                border-radius: 4px;
                color: white;
                z-index: 1000;
                background: \${type === 'success' ? '#27ae60' : type === 'error' ? '#e74c3c' : '#f39c12'};
            \`;
            msgDiv.textContent = message;
            
            document.body.appendChild(msgDiv);
            setTimeout(() => msgDiv.remove(), 3000);
        }
        
        // é¡µé¢åŠ è½½å®Œæˆåçš„åˆå§‹åŒ–
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
            showMessage('âœ… SmartMDParser æµ‹è¯•é¡µé¢å·²åŠ è½½', 'success');
            
            // è‡ªåŠ¨åŠ è½½ä¸€ä¸ªç¤ºä¾‹
            setTimeout(() => {
                loadFlexibleSample();
            }, 1000);
        });
    </script>
</body>
</html>
EOF
```

```bash
        function loadFlexibleSample() {
            const flexibleMD = \`# NodeMindé¡¹ç›®é‡æ„

## ç”¨æˆ·è®¤è¯ç³»ç»Ÿ
æˆ‘éœ€è¦å®ç°ä¸€ä¸ªJWTè®¤è¯ç³»ç»Ÿï¼Œä»Šå¤©å®ŒæˆåŸºç¡€åŠŸèƒ½ã€‚

## APIæ¥å£å¼€å‘

éœ€è¦éªŒè¯ç”¨æˆ·åå’Œå¯†ç

        function testSmartParser() {
            const mdContent = document.getElementById('mdInput').value;
            if (!mdContent.trim()) {
                showMessage('âŒ è¯·å…ˆè¾“å…¥MDæ–‡æ¡£å†…å®¹', 'error');
                return;
            }
            
            if (!smartParser) {
                showMessage('âŒ SmartMDParser æœªåˆå§‹åŒ–', 'error');
                return;
            }
            
            try {
                const sections = splitMDIntoSections(mdContent);
                const results = [];
                
                sections.forEach((section, index) => {
                    if (section.title && section.content) {
                        const parsed = smartParser.parse(section.content);
                        results.push({
                            index: index + 1,
                            originalTitle: section.title,
                            parsed: parsed
                        });
                    }
                });
                
                displaySmartParserResults(results);
                
            } catch (error) {
                console.error('âŒ SmartMDParser æµ‹è¯•å¤±è´¥:', error);
                showMessage(\`âŒ SmartMDParser æµ‹è¯•å¤±è´¥: \${error.message}\`, 'error');
            }
        }
        
        function testStructuredParser() {
            const mdContent = document.getElementById('mdInput').value;
            if (!mdContent.trim()) {
                showMessage('âŒ è¯·å…ˆè¾“å…¥MDæ–‡æ¡£å†…å®¹', 'error');
                return;
            }
            
            try {
                const nodes = parseStructuredMD(mdContent);
                displayStructuredResults(nodes);
            } catch (error) {
                console.error('âŒ ç»“æ„åŒ–è§£æå™¨æµ‹è¯•å¤±è´¥:', error);
                showMessage(\`âŒ ç»“æ„åŒ–è§£æå™¨æµ‹è¯•å¤±è´¥: \${error.message}\`, 'error');
            }
        }
        
        function compareResults() {
            const mdContent = document.getElementById('mdInput').value;
            if (!mdContent.trim()) {
                showMessage('âŒ è¯·å…ˆè¾“å…¥MDæ–‡æ¡£å†…å®¹', 'error');
                return;
            }
            
            try {
                const sections = splitMDIntoSections(mdContent);
                const smartResults = [];
                
                if (smartParser) {
                    sections.forEach((section, index) => {
                        if (section.title && section.content) {
                            const parsed = smartParser.parse(section.content);
                            smartResults.push(parsed);
                        }
                    });
                }
                
                const structuredResults = parseStructuredMD(mdContent);
                displayComparison(smartResults, structuredResults);
                
            } catch (error) {
                console.error('âŒ å¯¹æ¯”æµ‹è¯•å¤±è´¥:', error);
                showMessage(\`âŒ å¯¹æ¯”æµ‹è¯•å¤±è´¥: \${error.message}\`, 'error');
            }
        }
        
        function clearResults() {
            document.getElementById('results').innerHTML = '';
            showMessage('âœ… ç»“æœå·²æ¸…ç©º', 'success');
        }
        
        function splitMDIntoSections(mdContent) {
            const lines = mdContent.split('\\n');
            const sections = [];
            let currentSection = null;
            
            for (let i = 0; i < lines.length; i++) {
                const line = lines[i].trim();
                
                const titleMatch = line.match(/^(#{1,6})\\s+(.+)$/);
                if (titleMatch) {
                    if (currentSection) {
                        sections.push(currentSection);
                    }
                    
                    currentSection = {
                        level: titleMatch[1].length,
                        title: titleMatch[2].trim(),
                        content: line + '\\n',
                        lines: [line]
                    };
                } else if (currentSection) {
                    currentSection.content += line + '\\n';
                    currentSection.lines.push(line);
                }
            }
            
            if (currentSection) {
                sections.push(currentSection);
            }
            
            return sections;
        }
        
        function parseStructuredMD(mdContent) {
            const nodes = [];
            const lines = mdContent.split('\\n');
            
            let currentNode = null;
            let currentContent = [];
            
            for (let i = 0; i < lines.length; i++) {
                const line = lines[i].trim();
                if (!line) continue;
                
                const titleMatch = line.match(/^(#{2,6})\\s+(.+)$/);
                if (titleMatch) {
                    if (currentNode) {
                        currentNode.content = currentContent.join('\\n').trim();
                        nodes.push(currentNode);
                    }
                    
                    const level = titleMatch[1].length;
                    const title = titleMatch[2].trim();
                    
                    currentNode = {
                        id: generateId(title),
                        title: title,
                        level: level,
                        content: '',
                        tags: [],
                        author: 'ç”¨æˆ·',
                        priority: 'medium',
                        status: 'pending'
                    };
                    
                    currentContent = [];
                    continue;
                }
                
                if (currentNode) {
                    const idMatch = line.match(/èŠ‚ç‚¹ID.*\`([^\`]+)\`/);
                    if (idMatch) {
                        currentNode.id = idMatch[1].trim();
                        continue;
                    }
                    
                    const authorMatch = line.match(/ä½œè€….*\\|\\s*([^|]+)\\s*\\|/);
                    if (authorMatch) {
                        currentNode.author = authorMatch[1].trim();
                        continue;
                    }
                    
                    const priorityMatch = line.match(/ä¼˜å…ˆçº§.*\\|\\s*([^|]+)\\s*\\|/);
                    if (priorityMatch) {
                        currentNode.priority = priorityMatch[1].trim();
                        continue;
                    }
                    
                    const statusMatch = line.match(/çŠ¶æ€.*\\|\\s*([^|]+)\\s*\\|/);
                    if (statusMatch) {
                        currentNode.status = statusMatch[1].trim();
                        continue;
                    }
                    
                    const tagsMatch = line.match(/æ ‡ç­¾.*\\|\\s*([^|]+)\\s*\\|/);
                    if (tagsMatch) {
                        const tagString = tagsMatch[1].trim();
                        if (tagString !== 'æ— ' && tagString !== '') {
                            currentNode.tags = tagString.split(/[#\\s]+/)
                                .map(tag => tag.trim())
                                .filter(tag => tag);
                        }
                        continue;
                    }
                    
                    if (line.match(/^\\|/) || line.match(/^-+$/) || line.match(/^\\*\\*[^*]+\\*\\*:/)) {
                        continue;
                    }
                    
                    if (line !== '\`\`\`' && line.trim()) {
                        const contentTags = line.match(/#\\w+/g);
                        if (contentTags) {
                            contentTags.forEach(tag => {
                                const cleanTag = tag.substring(1);
                                if (!currentNode.tags.includes(cleanTag)) {
                                    currentNode.tags.push(cleanTag);
                                }
                            });
                        }
                        
                        currentContent.push(line);
                    }
                }
            }
            
            if (currentNode) {
                currentNode.content = currentContent.join('\\n').trim();
                nodes.push(currentNode);
            }
            
            return nodes;
        }
        
        function generateId(title) {
            const timestamp = Date.now();
            const random = Math.random().toString(36).substr(2, 6);
            const titleHash = title.slice(0, 10).replace(/[^a-zA-Z0-9]/g, '');
            return \`node_\${titleHash}_\${timestamp}_\${random}\`;
        }
        
        function displaySmartParserResults(results) {
            const html = \`
                <div class="result success">
                    <h3>ğŸ”® SmartMDParser è§£æç»“æœ</h3>
                    <div>è§£æèŠ‚ç‚¹æ•°: \${results.length}</div>
                    \${results.map(result => \`
                        <div style="margin: 15px 0; padding: 10px; border: 1px solid #ddd; border-radius: 4px;">
                            <h4>èŠ‚ç‚¹ \${result.index}: \${result.originalTitle}</h4>
                            <div><strong>æ¨æ–­ç±»å‹:</strong> \${result.parsed.type}</div>
                            <div><strong>æå–æ ‡é¢˜:</strong> \${result.parsed.title}</div>
                            <div><strong>å…­è¦ç´ :</strong></div>
                            <ul>
                                \${Object.entries(result.parsed.sixElements || {}).map(([key, value]) => 
                                    \`<li><strong>\${key}:</strong> \${value}</li>\`
                                ).join('')}
                            </ul>
                        </div>
                    \`).join('')}
                </div>
            \`;
            
            document.getElementById('results').innerHTML = html;
        }
        
        function displayStructuredResults(nodes) {
            const html = \`
                <div class="result warning">
                    <h3>ğŸ“‹ ç»“æ„åŒ–è§£æå™¨ç»“æœ</h3>
                    <div>è§£æèŠ‚ç‚¹æ•°: \${nodes.length}</div>
                    \${nodes.map((node, index) => \`
                        <div style="margin: 15px 0; padding: 10px; border: 1px solid #ddd; border-radius: 4px;">
                            <h4>èŠ‚ç‚¹ \${index + 1}: \${node.title}</h4>
                            <div><strong>ID:</strong> \${node.id}</div>
                            <div><strong>ä½œè€…:</strong> \${node.author}</div>
                            <div><strong>ä¼˜å…ˆçº§:</strong> \${node.priority}</div>
                            <div><strong>çŠ¶æ€:</strong> \${node.status}</div>
                            <div><strong>æ ‡ç­¾:</strong> \${node.tags.join(', ') || 'æ— '}</div>
                            <div><strong>å†…å®¹:</strong> \${node.content.substring(0, 100)}\${node.content.length > 100 ? '...' : ''}</div>
                        </div>
                    \`).join('')}
                </div>
            \`;
            
            document.getElementById('results').innerHTML = html;
        }

        function showMessage(message, type = 'success') {
            const existingMsg = document.querySelector('.temp-message');
            if (existingMsg) existingMsg.remove();
            
            const msgDiv = document.createElement('div');
            msgDiv.className = \`temp-message \${type}\`;
            msgDiv.style.cssText = \`
                position: fixed;
                top: 20px;
                right: 20px;
                padding: 10px 20px;
                border-radius: 4px;
                color: white;
                z-index: 1000;
                background: \${type === 'success' ? '#27ae60' : type === 'error' ? '#e74c3c' : '#f39c12'};
            \`;
            msgDiv.textContent = message;
            
            document.body.appendChild(msgDiv);
            setTimeout(() => msgDiv.remove(), 3000);
```
```bash
        }

        function testParser() {
            const content = document.getElementById("mdInput").value;
            if (!content) {
                alert("è¯·å…ˆåŠ è½½æ ·æœ¬æˆ–è¾“å…¥å†…å®¹");
                return;
            }
            
            if (!parser) {
                document.getElementById("results").innerHTML = "âŒ SmartMDParser æœªåˆå§‹åŒ–";
                return;
            }
            
            try {
                const sections = content.split(/^##\s+/m).filter(s => s.trim());
                const results = [];
                
                sections.forEach((section, i) => {
                    if (section.trim()) {
                        const parsed = parser.parse(section);
                        results.push({
                            index: i + 1,
                            parsed: parsed
                        });
                    }
                });
                
                let html = `<h3>è§£æç»“æœ (${results.length} ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹)</h3>`;
                
                results.forEach(result => {
                    html += `<div style="border: 1px solid #ccc; padding: 10px; margin: 10px 0;">
                        <h4>èŠ‚ç‚¹ ${result.index}</h4>
                        <p><strong>ç±»å‹:</strong> ${result.parsed.type}</p>
                        <p><strong>æ ‡é¢˜:</strong> ${result.parsed.title}</p>
                        <p><strong>å…­è¦ç´ :</strong></p>
                        <ul>`;
                    
                    Object.entries(result.parsed.sixElements || {}).forEach(([key, value]) => {
                        html += `<li><strong>${key}:</strong> ${value}</li>`;
                    });
                    
                    html += `</ul></div>`;
                });
                
                document.getElementById("results").innerHTML = html;
                
            } catch (error) {
                document.getElementById("results").innerHTML = `âŒ è§£æå¤±è´¥: ${error.message}`;
                console.error(error);
            }
        }
        
        // é¡µé¢åŠ è½½åè‡ªåŠ¨åŠ è½½æ ·æœ¬
        window.onload = function() {
            loadSample();
        };
    </script>
</body>
```
